      • getConfigValue

        public final java.lang.String getConfigValue(java.lang.String configValue,
                              java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Gets a config value, but if the config key does not exist, the value is created and the default value is returned.
        Parameters:
        configValue - The key in the config.
        defaultValue - The default value to return if configValue does not exist.
        Returns:

      • addConfigValues

        public final void addConfigValues(java.lang.String[] valueNames,
                   java.lang.String[] defaultValues)
        Adds multiple lines of data to the config. Each value in valueNames will be put in with the same value at the value's index in defaultValues. In other words:

        [1,2,3,4] valueNames

         |  |  |  |

        \/\/\/\/

        [1,2,3,4] defaultValues

        Parameters:
        valueNames -
        defaultValues -

      • doesConfigValueExist

        Gets whether the config option specified exists.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
